head.title: Holiday ideas for holiday rentals | Interchalet
head.description: Need some holiday rentals ideas? Why not rent a private holiday apartment in the resort of your choice and enjoy that well-earned break!

content.textLeft:
No matter how often you go on holiday, it's always nice to have new and refreshing holiday ideas. The options are endless when booking a high-quality and comfortable holiday home with Interchalet.  Go skiing in a winter wonderland, surfing on the beautiful coast, sightseeing in the bustling city or venture off the beaten track to go biking or hiking in the countryside. Bring your pets along and stay in a pet-friendly apartment so that you don’t feel like you left someone behind! Stay in a beautiful European city, or visit the United States, South Africa or Mauritius.

If you like to loaf about on a sun bed, you can do that summer and winter, with our great selection of self-catering villas and apartments across Southern Europe. We offer luxury holiday lettings in Spain, cozy chalets in Austria and basically quality holiday homes in all European countries, take the family somewhere special, head off on new adventures with friends, in season or out of season, on the beaten track or off the beaten track, you’ll always find a great range of accommodation, from studio apartments right up to castles, so whether it is Disneyland or Switzerland, you’ll find your perfect home from home with Interchalet.

Whatever you choose, it won’t cost as much as you think; self-catering is a great way to budget, whilst having complete freedom to enjoy your holiday just the way you like it... Your schedule, your fun, your holiday, your way!
content.textRight:
That is why a holiday in a holiday home or apartment is the right choice for you:

Holidays in a holiday home stand for freedom and independence, beginning with your individual arrival in your own car.

Be your own boss and enjoy your privacy, undisturbed.

You don’t have to share your accommodation and have the option to cater for yourself.

Design your own holiday without missing all the comfort, quality and security of home.

Relax on your holiday: you are in good hands. Make the most of personal assistance and a safe, yet hassle-free, hand-over of the key.

>> That's how safe you are in your holiday home! Find out more here

content.text: A short, straightforward journey as well as a familiar language and currency: You will have even more time and an increased holiday budget to really enjoy your holiday in the United Kingdom. It is also good to escape everyday life for just a few days, with Interchalet short breaks are possible. It's also worth taking a look at our last minute offers, or, if you are planning a longer stay, at holiday accommodation with an early booking discount.

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Good quality guaranteed!
elements.caption:
Our team visits the properties in-person.
Regular quality checks.
Detailed, honest descriptions of the accommodation.
Guaranteed authentic customer reviews.
Best rental prices for our customers!

elements.title: Personally there for you!
elements.caption:
Competent & friendly staff in our in-house Service-Centre.
All questions regarding your accommodation and surrounding area, happily answered.
Only you can rate your accommodation after your holiday with us!

elements.title: 49 years of experience!
elements.caption:
You can count on us: More than 49 years of experience in the holiday home industry.
Approx. 40,000 holiday homes and apartments selected for you in Europe and Florida.

elements.title: Why Interchalet?
elements.caption:
A simple apartment or an exclusive villa with private pool. In the mountains and by the sea, in summer and winter. At Interchalet you will find the right accommodation for your dream holiday in a holiday home.
We currently have approx. 40.000 holiday houses and holiday apartments for your holidays!

elements.title: Spending time in a holiday home is the ideal solution for everyone!
elements.caption:
If you would like to enjoy a relaxing holiday as a couple or with family and friends, then you will love spending time in a holiday home or holiday apartment.
You can spend your holiday your way, in typical accommodation for your destination so you can quickly get familiar with the country and its people. An individual and unique holiday experience. Together we can find the ideal destination for your holiday based on your interests and preferences.
